short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension brings small improvements to codewars.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to easily identify solved and unsolved codewars.com exercises by replacing their background. Successfully completed katas have a green background color while the ones that haven't been solved yet have a red background color. Besides making the status of each exercise more visible, it also blocks all the ads displayed on CodeWars.
